Double‐sigmoidal base function

Source: R/doublesigmoidalFitFunctions_h0.R
f0.Rd

A helper “base” function used internally by the double‐sigmoidal fit formula.

Usage

f0(x, B1, M1, B2, L)

Arguments

x

Numeric vector of time points.

B1

Positive slope parameter for the first rise.

M1

Midpoint of the first rise.

B2

Positive slope parameter for the second fall.

L

Distance between the two midpoints.

Value

Numeric vector of the same length as `x`.

On this page
